item.title: Episode 6: How to Moderate Off Platform Content
item.description: On today’s episode of the Modcast Podcast, we move on from discussing moderating in teams to discuss issues that can stem from moderation; how to address off platform content. Joining us are our guests binchlord and ScarletBliss, and, as always, our hosts Sean and Kairi. Episode Guests We have, today, the pleasure of being joined by binchlord and ScarletBliss. binchlord currently helps to manage the LGBT+ Youth server, a queer youth server focused on education about the community and navigating life as a young queer person and has been moderating LGBTQ+ spaces on Discord since 2018!
